title: UC00184_Analysing_microclimate_and_soil_interactions_for_urban_sustainability
name: UC00184_Analysing_microclimate_and_soil_interactions_for_urban_sustainability
description: Analyses Melbourne microclimate and soil-sensor data to understand how temperature, humidity, wind speed, and vapour-pressure deficit influence soil-moisture trends, supporting sustainable irrigation and urban green-space management.
datasets: City of Melbourne Microclimate Sensor Data
City of Melbourne Soil Sensor Data
